properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 8:58AM CST until January 20 at 5:20AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* until Sunday, January 19.
* At 8 AM Saturday the stage was 15.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Maximum forecast stage of 15.9 feet on Sunday, January 19.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* The river will hold steady through Sunday morning, then begin a
rapid fall, dropping below flood stage Sunday evening.
* At 17.0 feet...Water is flowing over portions of Hood Road and
extensive agricultural flooding is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
